item.title: Virginia sheriff accused of violating ethics law, in rare Hatch Act case
item.description: It’s the first time the ethics watchdog has brought a Hatch Act action against a local or state official in at least a decade.

item.title: Johnson says he still controls the House. Some fellow Republicans disagree.
